metadata.synopsis: One of the memories available in the Colony "Brain Reader" foreshadows Mamzell Amira, a character from the serial killer questline in act 3/Baldur's Gate.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MemLib_AllJars" to get all the brain jars and teleport to the Brain Reading Device.- In front of you will be a severed head and a receptacle to its left. Insert the appropriate brain jar into the receptacle by interacting with it - the jar is called "Closed Mind".- After inserting the jar, it will appear on top of the receptacle and you can talk to the severed head for the dialogue to start.

0.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
0.text: Won't be laughing. Won't be laughing when I'm a watchman.
0.context: NodeContext: Bitter but dazed mutterings - not aware of player's presence, or that they're just a brain in a jar

2.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
2.text: They won't be laughing much longer. Won't be any more of this 'No gnomes in the City Watch, Brevin'.
2.context: NodeContext: Bitter but dazed mutterings - not aware of player's presence, or that they're just a brain in a jar

1.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
1.text: This Gortash fella's got an idea. Kind of a training camp. Don't know how it gets me into the watch, but he seems the smart sort...
